lead_paragraph: BAXTER--Joan K. of Locust Valley, NY and Palm Beach Gardens, FL on March 24, 2016 age 90. Loving mother of Raymond S. III and John H. Proud grandmother of Kevin J., Diana, Todd, Hanley and Theodora. Interment private. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Old Westbury Gardens or Glen Cove Hospital. www.DodgeThomas.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BAXTER, JOAN K
